title: Login Issue
description: User unable to login with correct credentials.

title: Payment Failed
description: Customer's payment was declined during checkout.

title: Broken Link on Homepage
description: The 'Contact Us' link on the homepage is not working.

title: Mobile App Crash
description: The app crashes when clicking on 'My Orders'.

title: Password Reset Not Working
description: Customer did not receive a password reset email.

title: Slow Website Performance
description: Website takes more than 10 seconds to load.

title: Email Notification Delay
description: Customer not receiving order confirmation emails instantly.

title: Order Not Delivered
description: Customer reports order not delivered even after payment.

title: Incorrect Billing
description: Customer charged twice for a single order.

title: Feature Request
description: Customer requested dark mode feature for the app.
